comment: Very considerate and nice professor. You will have to read a book every week,then come to class and discus about the book. There are 2 tests,a presentation,a rough draft,a final draft,and rush writes at the beginning of each class. It's not hard to make an a. You just have to put some effort into the class.

Awesome teacher. You must attend the classes and read the books assigned because they will help you. You have one presentation to make, a rush write on the books read, a paper-draft and final draft. very considerate and warm lady. You will really make an A in this class if u want to.She is ready to help.
Mrs.Esplin is a great teacher. You just have to read all the books she assigns you, but her test is so easy you don't really have to study!

Great professor. Class is very easy if you read the books and attend class. Tests were long but not really hard, and there are only 2, a midterm and a final. Also assigns a paper and a short presentation. Tries to make the class interesting and encourage discussion. An all around great professor.
